A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is a humongous turd. I want my money back.
The professional critics should be ashamed. 
91%? They all must have been watching a different movie than we have.
Maybe Disney produced a special edition just for them\, without all the plot holes\, paper-thin characters\, deus ex machina everywhere\, stupid plot twists created only to subvert expectations\, incoherent dialogs\, utter disrespect for the SW lore.
A 91% tomatometer for this steaming pile of Johnson's shit can only be explained this way.
Or\, maybe they have been paid to lie.
For sure I will not trust them when the next SW movies will come out of Disney's butt hole.
